summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of FlashBot DeFi arbitrage bot (iteration 3) - ALL systems functioning perfectly at 100% success rate. Backend APIs, frontend UI, and integration tests all pass.
passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints passing (GET /api/health, /api/stats, /api/opportunities, /api/trades, /api/logs, /api/status, /api/settings, PUT /api/settings)
Dashboard loads with FlashBot::Dashboard header correctly
All 6 stats cards visible and populated (Net Profit: +1.3416 ETH, Win Rate: 100%, Total Trades: 10, Opportunities: 15, Best Trade: 0.2805 ETH, Avg Profit: 0.13416 ETH)
Tab navigation between Opportunities and Trades works perfectly
Opportunities table displays 15 sample opportunities with realistic multi-DEX data
Trades table displays 10 sample trades with working TX hash links to BaseScan
All TX hash links open correctly in new tabs to BaseScan blockchain explorer
Settings panel opens/closes correctly with all 9 configurable fields present
Settings can be modified and saved successfully (tested gas price update)
Bot active checkbox toggle functionality working
Live Logs panel shows 30 entries with proper timestamp and level formatting
Refresh button updates dashboard data correctly
Footer displays correct information (AAVE V3 Flash Loans, Base Mainnet, Paths Loaded)
No error messages or console errors detected
All DEX integration information properly displayed (Uniswap V3, Aerodrome, PancakeSwap, Odos)
Multi-hop arbitrage paths shown correctly (e.g., DAI -> WETH -> USDbC -> DAI)
Profit/loss data formatted correctly with proper color coding
